subject: Tennis
Sony Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Maria Sharapova won only five points in the first four games before settling down to reach the quarterfinals at the Sony Open in Key Biscayne, Fla., by beating Kirsten Flipkens, 3-6, 6-4, 6-1.
snippet: Maria Sharapova won only five points in the first four games before settling down to reach the quarterfinals at the Sony Open in Key Biscayne, Fla., by beating Kirsten Flipkens, 3-6, 6-4, 6-1.
